alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Nueces; Kleberg Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nueces and northeastern Kleberg Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Texas Botanical Gardens, or near Corpus Christi, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Flour Bluff, Corpus Christi Country Club, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Cabaniss Field, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Bay Area Medical Center, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Waldron Field, La Palmera Mall and Chapman Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Nueces; Kleberg Islands
